Literature.Title: Defining principles that influence antimicrobial peptide activity against capsulated Klebsiella pneumoniae.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2020;117:27620-27626
Literature.Author: Fleeman RM, Macias LA, Brodbelt JS, Davies BW

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:LD50=23±1 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:LD90=47±1 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Klebsiella pneumoniae MKP 103(MIC=>128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii AB5075(MIC=2µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC=>128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=64µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=>128µM)
